page.title: 04RELIGION (2)
page.content: {Baptist Church -}Sunday services, 11a.m. & 6 p.m.(which includes communion monthly).Family Service monthly,Sunday School 11 a.m. & 2.30 p.m. House meeting for teenagers, Bible study and Home discussion groups,Women's meetings and Prayer meetings all held weekly.Regular attendance, 200 .Special services are held annually for church and Sunday School anniversaries. {Methodist Church}- belongs to St.Ives circuit,Rev.Goodhand minister for 5 years.Sunday service, 6p.m.& Sunday school 2 p.m.,Family Service monthly. Lay preachers often take a Sunday service.Church has 12 members and 15 children.Services are held for Church and Sunday School anniversaries.A "Sankey Evening" is held in March when neighbouring churchgoers meet for hymn singing.Harvest services held by all.
